DOC.brief_summary: This study will determine whether certain blood pressure medications will slow cyst growth or keep kidneys functioning longer in patients with autosomal dominant polycystic kidney disease (ADPKD). The study will take place at several sites in the United States. The start date of the study has not yet been determined.
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Trial to Slow the Progression of ADPKD
DOC.criteria: Previous diagnosis of autosomal dominant polycystic kidney disease by abdominal imaging Previous diagnosis of high blood pressure or current blood pressures above 130/80 mm Hg
